name: Fighting Jetstars
description:
Justin, Danila, Nicole, and Bryson, known as the Fighting Jetstars, are off to save the world from 5 Evil beings destroy the peace of earth!

Features:

Play up to 4 players as their favorite characters!

Includes 5 Stages of shooting and dodging action!

Use your saved password to continue where you left!

When you complete the game, you will get a special password!

Shoot the Hyper Star to use your superpower! Try them all!
